Kids First Data Portal Overview
===================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

      KF_index
      KF_UsingThePortal


.. only:: not i18n

  .. Objectives::
      * Get accounts on the Portal
      * Find and Filter data sets
      * Move data to Cavatica


  .. danger:: This is the documentation for the development (master) branch.
                    Looking for the documentation of the current **stable** branch?
                    `Have a look here <https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable>`_.

.. seealso:: This is a simple **seealso** note. Other inline directive may be included (e.g., math :math:`\alpha`) but not al of them.

This is for our ultimate goal of analyzing KF data in Cavatica. KFDP is home to the *data*. Cavatica is home to the *analysis tools*. You will also see Cavatica called the "cloud computing resource."
